name: The Endless Knight
description:
A short narrative adventure game created for Weekly Game Jam #97, "Strange Garden". 

You play as an immortal wolf named Nimbus, the companion to a legendary knight named Lady Wrenfell who is continually reincarnated upon her death. On the Endless Night, a magical occurrence that happens once in a millenia, Nimbus wants to create a potion to grant Lady Wrenfell immortality, too, so she will never have to die again.

You can:
- Find the  seeds to grow the potion ingredients
- Plant and harvest them to create the Potion to Restore the Soul
- Check how far along the plants are after you've planted them
- Interact with other animals in the garden

I created, wrote, designed, and programmed the game  in RPGMaker MV using assets from some incredible creators. It is my very first finished game (!!) and I would love to know what you think of it. You can leave a comment below, contact me on Twitch, Twitter, or Instagram @nimblefizz, or email me at nimblefizz@gmail.com.
